      SubscriberInterface Broker.createSocketSubscriber()

      Adds a client as a player to a game already created.
      void Broker.subscribe(SubscriberInterface subscriber, java.util.UUID clientId)
      The subscribe method of the broker provides an unified way for rmi and sockets clients to subscribe to a game.
